vlive.korean: [기적의 희망 품어 보는 모모] 안 보였겠지? 안 나왔나? [MOMO hopes for a miracle] Was my face on camera? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "Feel Special" EP.03
vlive.english: [MOMO hopes for a miracle] Was my face on camera?

vlive.korean: 좀 북극곰처럼 뭔가 따뜻하게 품어주는 다른 연습생이 있나요? Is there any trainee whom you take care of, like a mother polar bear? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [Full] <월드 클래스> 첫방송 카운트다운 라이브 / Countdown Live
vlive.english: Is there any trainee whom you take care of, like a mother polar bear?

vlive.korean: 품어줬답니다. She covered it. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 안자는버디?
품어줄 것 같은 느낌이 있어. Looks like you can embrace everyone. 듣기 View video FANTAGIO MUSIC : <5urprise in Japan> 서프라이즈 첫 브이앱!
vlive.english: Looks like you can embrace everyone.

vlive.korean: 근데 이래놓고 열심히 품어줬어요. She did that and snuggled them up again. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 안자는버디?
vlive.english: She did that and snuggled them up again.

examples.korean: He’s borne me a grudge ever since that day. 발음듣기 그는 그날 이후로 계속 나에게 원한을 품어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s borne me a grudge ever since that day. 발음

examples.korean: He’s borne a grudge against me ever since that day. 발음듣기 그는 그날 이후로 계속 나에게 원한을 품어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s borne a grudge against me ever since that day. 발음

examples.korean: She had been nursing a secret desire to see him again. 발음듣기 그녀는 그를 다시 만나려는 은밀한 욕망을 품어 오고 있던 참이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had been nursing a secret desire to see him again. 발음

examples.korean: He had been nursing a grievance against his boss for months. 발음듣기 그는 자기 상사에 대해 몇 달째 불만을 품어 오고 있는 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had been nursing a grievance against his boss for months. 발음

examples.korean: She had always had a sneaking affection for him. 발음듣기 그녀는 항상 그에게 남몰래 애정을 품어 오던 참이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had always had a sneaking affection for him. 발음
